name: Girl Doll Toy: Tamashii o Kudasai
overview: Girl Doll Toy: Tamashii o Kudasai is an Adventure game, developed and published by Xuse, which was released in Japan in 1998. In the near future. Our hero works in a laboratory developing human-like androids. He picks up an android that was fated to be disposed, upgraded her and named her Erika. At some point he starts to feel romantic emotions for her...
